Source.Name: jasper
Source.Summary: JasPer Project is a software-based reference implementation of the codec specified in the JPEG-2000 Part-1 standard.
Source.Description: JasPer Project is an open-source initiative to provide a free software-based reference implementation of the codec specified in the JPEG-2000 Part-1 standard
